website_summaries.verdict: The type of stereo to choose for older vehicles when you want to add modern conveniences like Bluetooth connectivity.
pros: Comes with an affordable price tag as a simple way to add advanced features such as Bluetooth hands-free calling and audio streaming to single din vehicles
Uses an external microphone for crystal-clear calling
A dual Bluetooth connection allows you to connect two phones or smart devices at the same time
cons: The device can unexpectedly reset itself at random

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pick!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself in my daily commute car and am so happy I did. Installation was a snap since I've done this before and simply wired my old harness to the new stereo. The NFC Bluetooth pairing worked like a charm. The Bluetooth play of my music and podcasts is very nice with Android. I especially like the customizable color settings. It really blends in with the rest of the car. What surprised me is it correctly dims when the rest of the I instrument gauges dim. That is the first aftermarket stereo I've seen that really does it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: its ok but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I installed this receiver into my car. I could never get the Bluetooth to work. The connection between the faceplate and unit is poor - after two months it has stopped connecting well - I have to remove and replace the faceplate a few times to be able to get the display and functions to work. UPDATE: It is totally dead now - it does not work at all. Piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Installed perfectly and looks amazing, was put into a 97 camry What scares ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed perfectly and looks amazing, was put into a 97 camry What scares me is how hot the back of this thing gets I don't know if it is normal or not but that is my only complaint, fader works front and back is correct and left to right is correct as well. I don't understand what would cause the back to get scolding hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Already burning out
customer_reviews.text: Sounds decent, Bluetooth works OK the EQ has a ton of unnecessary features, makes it to hard to dial in a good tone...... 3 weeks later.... It's almsot completely done, Bluetooth randomly connects sometimes it doesn't at all, tuner doesn't work, this morning it didn't even power up, at this point its working less and less gonna return before its to late
customer_reviews.author: Steve James Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good job Sony!!
customer_reviews.text: Just fantastic!! I had an older model in my truck and it worked just fine, except, no Bluetooth and no USB port. The radio sounds a hundred times better then the old one and the Bluetooth works great. Now I can talk on the phone while driving. I am really pleased. I did have to change the connector but it was pretty easy to do. It just Looks Great and sounds out of this world. Nice job Sony!!.
customer_reviews.author: isabelle timms

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and looks
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and the lights are amazing but teixe I had an issue where the bluetooth wouldn't even come on and the regular radio wouldn't play even though it was picking up the station I took the faceplate off for a few minutes and reattached it and it worked perfectly fine after that
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bass

customer_reviews.title: Stop Working after 3 weeks and too late to return or fix
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 1 star, but wish I could give it 0. I installed the radio and it worked for a few weeks and then it stopped working. By the time it stopped working, it was too late to return the item and too late to ask for support. I am very disappointed. Less then a month of music for over $100 what a rip off. When it worked, it sounded great, but only 3 weeks of music for $100 is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Price

customer_reviews.title: Item described as is.
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Sony stereo for my cars for past 5 years. Love the quality of the sound and design of the unit. Will buy again in future.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sony Head
customer_reviews.text: This is another great Sony product. I've used Sony car stereos for a long time. Bluetooth works great with Iphone 6s and 7.
customer_reviews.author: CANDICE OSBORNE

customer_reviews.title: Big mix up
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Mex-N5200BT and I got a Mex-N5300BT. Must have been a mix up hopefully I will not have this problem again. Just got the return processed and sending it back and I have to order another hopefully this will not happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: CD player stops working have to keep having to factory reset, Called customer service it’s 5 days after date to return they will exchange but I have to send the bad one back and wait on new one to come in 5-10 very inconvenient bc I will have to ride in my car with no Radio until I receive new replacement I would never order there product agian
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha scott

customer_reviews.title: MEX-5200BT
customer_reviews.text: Good radio. Having some issue with sound. Probably just a setting. For certain fixes you really do need the instructions...
customer_reviews.author: Sara A Krisanits

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed by Sony with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product, it worked fine but at any moment the Bluetooth does not work, the audio is choppy, it does not connect well, it connects when it feels like it, I was really disappointed by Sony with this product, I would like you to help me with this !!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stereo
customer_reviews.text: Not only was this a Great price! But I found a tech that installed this for a very low cost. Overall great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: great unit for the money.
customer_reviews.text: works just fine. great sound, easy to get connected and setup on bluetooth. external mic makes hand free calls sound good.
customer_reviews.author: robert c. wolf

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Half the time it doesn't connect to your phone. Other than that - it sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: L. P

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works when it wants to. Very annoying. Sometimes it doesn't connect at all after starting vehicle. i even had problems with the front aux, after unsuccessfully trying to re connect to Bluetooth i decided to use aux cord. After plugging in cord no sound came out. Save yourself a headache and buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony burkhalter

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit.
customer_reviews.text: This head unit worked perfectly...untip I got a Samsung smart watch. Ever since I got the watch, Bluetooth audio on the unit stutters and is choppy, so either I have to use the aux cord or turn my watch off. I've use several other head units eith the watch and none of them have had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jaehnert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Radio For the Price
customer_reviews.text: This radio was easy to install and set up. Sounds great and easy to pair with my iphone. Will be buying another one of these for my other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Cleavenger

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for songpal because I have a iPad install. So I’m only using it for output only rca’s for front rear and sub. So with this unit songpal is ok but the volume is not so with only using for output to all alpine amps, components and sub the volume cuts out just past halfway.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin h.

customer_reviews.title: It was really so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Pack arrived with a little bit injury. Arrived from US to Turkey in 12 days. I also used ISO AB socket and it was easier to mount. The car also has originally ISO AB sockets on it. My car is 2004 VW Polo. And the sound is marvelous. Because I was using the original stereo system in the car (VW beta I mean). Bluetooth sound quality is best that I ever used. Thanks for speed shipment and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mert YILMAZ

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Sony
customer_reviews.text: Really good just to put face on is sometimes hard.
customer_reviews.author: El matador

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sounds great and the blue-tooth is awesome! Hands free phone works great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome receiver, great upgrade to sound system in my truck
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Its I great radio but, for a noob like me I didn't understand the equalizer because it's in bands and Hertz but over all I love it. I just wish the controls where easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bissell

customer_reviews.title: It's a good deal for the money for sure
customer_reviews.text: I love the radio deff want the mex-xb120bt I only gave it a 4 star because I cant realy hear when I'm on a call other then that DOPE radio
customer_reviews.author: Jefferey Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth audio connection is poor at startup
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth audio connection is poor at startup. Firmware is M 12 / S 34. See video.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. A lot of features at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jo

customer_reviews.title: have had trouble with making calls and sony is not ...
customer_reviews.text: have had trouble with making calls and sony is not able to solve the problem and replaced it and still have problem. they will not give refund
customer_reviews.author: JRClarkejr

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love how the bluetooth automatically connects and starts playing my playlist
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: EQ & mega bass are hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Great radio ... I bought the same radio but no Bluetooth & I really liked it... but this one is soo much better, the knob is smoother & buttons feel right & not cheap...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very good stero
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a old unit in my truck.. After installing I was surprised how good it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great deck
customer_reviews.text: Really love the way it looks and all the settings it has. Just wondering how to shut off the annoying beeping from when you shut your key off
customer_reviews.author: Lucas D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed and happy with the product. Replaced an older version to get the latest and best features and happy I did and stayed with Sony.
customer_reviews.author: CB1

customer_reviews.title: Solid unit!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Sounds great, installed in a half hour in my Jeep YJ.
customer_reviews.author: PassLake

customer_reviews.title: Sirius xm doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The xm Sirius radio is outdated and will not work nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Barnie

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Android phone a little hard to get programmed but they all are.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: There's some bluetooth problems, sometimes don't even connect automatic and disconnect as well
customer_reviews.author: omar ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Sony does not stand behind its warranty.
customer_reviews.text: The product was received in a complete failure mode. Talked to several expert stereo installers, and they determined that the Sony stereo was completely dead. Amazon replaced the unit, but I didn't get it returned to them within their 30 day return window. They referred me to Sony to seek a refund for the returned dead unit, since it was still in the 1 year warranty. Sony refused to refund the $100 purchase price, and would only offer a replacement. Obviously I didn't need replacement. Would not buy another one of these junk units. I have another similar Sony and its poor quality, hard to use, and over designed for the basic application of a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this it sux
customer_reviews.text: Looks good n all that but when install the sound sux
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth feature is nice but no matter the settings, the sound quality is mediocre at best. I even replaced the factory speakers but to know avail and yes, speakers were phased correctly. Maybe it needs a separate amp to help it along? The unit does not live up to the advertised hype. Very disappointed and returned to Amazon and even paid the restocking fee. Run from this thing in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: loudv8

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping it was plug-n-play - not.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a 2007 Sony unit in an RV I bought. I 'really' needed Bluetooth; I listen to podcasts, hardly ever music. I looked at a bunch of other brands with BT but thought Sont-to-Sony would be a 5-minute job ...eh-eh. The harness plug has the same number of pins but is 30% smaller on the new unit. Luckily, the color-codes are universal - I have all the soldering stuff, etc - but I could have saved a chunk buying a different brand with BT. The sound is fine - operating the menu waaay too fiddly ...intuitive for Bill Gates, maybe. But, I am sure this will work well for even for the next person. Jim
customer_reviews.author: JimCan

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!  Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my motorhome, had to make a custom mount for installation, unit worked when installed and for 1 trip down the road. My next trip all it did was blink off and on and wouldn't tune into anything, Bluetooth or radio functions. To late to return it according to Amazon so now I'm out the money and have to buy something else, I guess it pays to shop local and face to face.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Doran

customer_reviews.title: Nice functional car stereo
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sony for a car both bought for Bluetooth integration with my phone(s) They both worked great and each successive model improves over the last. They are not the best you can get but these are a bargain I bought this to replace a pile of rubbish which the product name rhymes with pile pyle of s#1t
customer_reviews.author: Alan K

customer_reviews.title: I really do like it
customer_reviews.text: But, at random intervals, it sounds broken coming out of the speakers. More often with the bass boost off and the EQ off (not adjusted on any frequency). It sounds awful when this happens. Apart from that, it looks sweet, powers my speakers great, and I have no problem with Sony's app.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hankey

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, bad stereo
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work at least the BT. Will never connect to any device, iPhone, ipdad, androids, etc. No more Sony products for me! Only reason I'm keeping it, is I do not have time to uninstall it, or I would. Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mazy

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: not the most current technology, but very good receiver. a lot of the extra useless crap is not included, which means they focused on the useful features.
customer_reviews.author: DWGreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good for shop truck
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly top of the line. Bought it mainly for the red lighting has it’s very dark in my cab so I can see out the windshield
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: A little confusing reading the manual and trying to setup
customer_reviews.author: James K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and operation
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit and alot of options / features. The bluetooth mic is nice and small and looks very neat and the clarity is awesome on both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound. Perfect manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding head unit. Distortion begins at #42. It does it all. I’ll skip Alpine and Pioneer and make my trunk bump with this head unit.
customer_reviews.author: adjestil01

customer_reviews.title: Get the correct wiring harness adapter, adapter faceplate and antenna adapter for your vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, features and piece of cake to install and setup. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Boss stereo with this one. What a difference! Easy to install, works and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good stereo would buy another again !
customer_reviews.author: Clinton M.

customer_reviews.title: I have to say there isn't anything I dislike about this radio
customer_reviews.text: I have to say there isn't anything I dislike about this radio...I think it puts out great sound love all the features it has it eas a great purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sound feature rich stereo. Controls take some time to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin' Fool

customer_reviews.title: What is annoying is that I have to pair manually to the ...
customer_reviews.text: What is annoying is that I have to pair manually to the bluetooth every time I turned on the car, other than that I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Jose M Vasquez

product_meta.title: Sony MEX-N5200BT CD Receiver with Bluetooth, external microphone and SiriusXM Ready (Disco by manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Enjoy twice the connectivity and twice the colors in your car, with the MEX-N5200BT Bluetooth CD receiver. Dual Bluetooth means you can connect two smartphones wirelessly, with the second being exclusively for making hands-free calls.1 the two-zone illuminator lets you choose from 35,000 colors to match your car’s interior.
feature_bullets: Dual Bluetooth connection lets you connect two smartphones simultaneously
Voice control with Siri eyes free and song pal, Output Power: 55 W.Audio level adjustment : Yes (-6dB - +6dB)
High-power amplifier delivers clear, natural-sounding audio
Two-zone illuminator can match your car’s interior colors
Aoa 2.0 compatible USB terminal lets you connect music players and smartphones

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
